[酱]
Simplified from 醬 ( 將 → ⿰丬夕 )

[醬]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ʔsaŋs ): phonetic 將 ( OC *ʔsaŋ, *ʔsaŋs ) + semantic 酉 ( “ drink ” ) .

[醤]
Unofficial Japanese Simplified from 醬 ( 將 → 将 ) (extended shinjitai); compare 奨 .
Current form Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 ): phonetic 将 + semantic 酉 ( “ drink ” )
